attributes.background: 10 commandments have all been broken,how many more lives within our world do we have see on the news in all countries to suffer pain,sorrow and anger.recycling is a must as well,if you really care for your children&so on,you will recycle,reuse&reduce to save our planet,not dump on landfields,as you are the cause to our climate change,putting holes within our earths core.you have 2months to sort this mess out,within your government,all parties work together,no-one should be incharge,teamwork,isee the future, that if you open yourself more you can see the clearer picture,would be very helpfull if where i live,south glos&bristol council be as one for a change,communication is the key,if all of us had the proper recycle bins,and every1 cared enough about our future,and recycled our world would be a greener earth,less worry on the rainforests,carbon footprint,appreciate&not abuse water,electricity,as third world countries dont have our sources,all be equal,no-one suffer,human rights,this is all an explanation of worldpeace,do this for princess diana,mother tereasa,john lennon,god bless,ms thorne.x
